name: Ping Gateway
description: Verifies network connectivity by pinging the default gateway.
check_cmd: if command -v ip >/dev/null && command -v ping >/dev/null; then G=$(ip route | awk '/default/ {print $3}' | head -n1); [ -n "$G" ] && ping -c1 -W2 $G >/dev/null 2>&1 && echo active || echo inactive; else echo skip; fi
fix_cmd: ip link set $(ip route | awk '/default/ {print $5}' | head -n1) down && sleep 2 && ip link set $(ip route | awk '/default/ {print $5}' | head -n1) up || true
